import React from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Collapse, NavItem, NavLink, Nav, TabContent, TabPane, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; class Nuis extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { verticalTabsIcons: "brain", openedCollapses: ["collapseOne"] }; } // with this function we create an array with the opened collapses // it is like a toggle function for all collapses from this page collapsesToggle = (e, collapse) => { e.preventDefault(); let openedCollapses = this.state.openedCollapses; if (openedCollapses.includes(collapse)) { this.setState({ openedCollapses: openedCollapses.filter(item => item !== collapse) }); } else { openedCollapses.push(collapse); this.setState({ openedCollapses: openedCollapses }); } }; // with this function we change the active tab for all the tabs in this page changeActiveTab = (e, tabState, tadName) => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [tabState]: tadName }); }; render() { return ( <>
Natural User Interface's {/* color-classes: "nav-pills-primary", "nav-pills-info", "nav-pills-success", "nav-pills-warning","nav-pills-danger" */}
this.changeActiveTab( e, "verticalTabsIcons", "brain" ) } > Brain this.changeActiveTab( e, "verticalTabsIcons", "Touch" ) } > Touch this.changeActiveTab( e, "verticalTabsIcons", "Speech" ) } > Speech this.changeActiveTab( e, "verticalTabsIcons", "Gesture" ) } > Gesture this.changeActiveTab( e, "verticalTabsIcons", "Gaze" ) } > Gaze
NUI: Brain
